alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Fulton; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 12:21PM EDT until September 07 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Breezewood, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Breezewood, Everett, Crystal Springs, Waterfall, Rockhill Furnace, Wells Tannery, Dudley, Valley-Hi, Saluvia, Shy Beaver, Trough Creek State Park and Entriken. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 from mile markers 147 to 154. The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 155 to 176. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
